location.sjis: ディックル村 釣り人の池

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 武器を取りに来たのか？
portrait_l.ascii: Here to pick up a weapon?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 武器を預けに来たのか？
portrait_l.ascii: Here to drop off a weapon?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 預けられそうな武器が無いぞ
portrait_l.ascii: You have no weapons to drop off.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: アカバネって召喚獣が暴れてるって プロスバンの町から来たヤツに 聞いたんだ
portrait_l.ascii: I've heard theres a Stray called Red Wing that's causing trouble. Someone from Prosban told me.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: とてつもなく凶暴なヤツらしい ほんと、あぶなくってしょうがない
portrait_l.ascii: It's supposed to be very ferocious. Man, it's so dangerous these days.
